attributes.action: Stop flights in and out of uk to stop covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Its will help us cope with covid 19
attributes.background: Lets stop.all flights for at least 2 or 4 weeks in and out of the uk to help stop the spread this is why it's in the uk coz the border was not shot

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
